name: DreamScape (itch) (DarkCircles, Null&Void)
description:
Even in your nightmares, you still have control.

Welcome to Walter's mind. So great and peaceful... Well if he wasn't having a nightmare at the moment. You'd better help him out, he's kinda useless by himself. Especially since the darker part of his mind is trying to drive him insane.

Features

  • Control Walter as he walks and jumps through his own twisted nightmare
  • Shift gravity to solve puzzles that Walter's stupid brain has come up with
  • Avoid the apparitions of Walter's psyche as they try to end his sanity
  • Altars refill your gravity abilities thanks to that nice part of Walter's mind
